tests.name: coverage perm_lex
tests.run: python3 -m coverage run perm_lex_tests.py 2>/dev/null; python3 -m coverage report -m --fail-under=100

tests.name: type check perm_lex
tests.run: echo "mypy type check"; mypy --disallow-untyped-defs perm_lex.py perm_lex_tests.py

tests.name: coverage rec_list
tests.setup: sudo apt-get install software-properties-common >/dev/null; sudo apt-get update >/dev/null; sudo apt-get install python3.8 >/dev/null; sudo update-alternatives --install /usr/bin/python python /usr/bin/python3.8 1 >/dev/null; sudo -H pip install coverage >/dev/null
tests.run: python -m coverage run rec_list_tests.py 2>/dev/null; python -m coverage report -m --fail-under=100

tests.name: type check rec_list
tests.run: echo "mypy type check"; mypy --disallow-untyped-defs --python-version 3.8 rec_list.py rec_list_tests.py

tests.name: coverage bears
tests.run: python3 -m coverage run bears_tests.py 2>/dev/null; python3 -m coverage report -m --fail-under=100

tests.name: type check bears
tests.run: echo "mypy type check"; mypy --disallow-untyped-defs bears.py bears_tests.py
